description: Ask Alexa to make the sounds of your favorite animals. She learns new animal sounds all the time and is doing her best to imitate them. Don't be afraid when you hear her roar like a lion. She probably won't eat you.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Animal Sounds what noise a lion says.
Alexa, ask Animal Sounds to imitate a lion.
Alexa, ask animal sounds to make an elephant noise.
name: Animal Sounds
shortDescription: Alexa is learning a few new languages, animal languages that is. Ask Alexa to make the sounds your favorite animal makes.
